name: real_time_hashtag_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_data.
Tool description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.   -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
API description: Searches for live hashtags on social media based on a given keyword.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for related hashtags.
